com.sk.objects

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sk.objects.Deck

  • public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
    Class creates the Deck object, which represents a deck of cards in the game
    Author:
    Samra Kasim

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> acesList 
      private java.util.ArrayList<Card> deckOfCards 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Deck()
      Constructor to instantiate a new deck object that contains the representation of 52 Card objects in an ArrayList of type Card and also an ArrayList of type String that contains the list of all aces

      • Deck

        public Deck()
        Constructor to instantiate a new deck object that contains the representation of 52 Card objects in an ArrayList of type Card and also an ArrayList of type String that contains the list of all aces

    • Method Detail

      • getCards

        public java.util.ArrayList<Card> getCards()
        Getter method to return an ArrayList of type Card
        Returns:
        deckofCards: an ArrayList of type Card

      • takeHit

        public Card takeHit(Deck deck,
                    Participant participant)
        Method that represents taking a hit. The method generates a random number, which is utilized to pick a Card object from the deckOfCards ArrayList. Since, an Ace can either be valued at 1 or 11, if the Card picked is an ace, the method takes into account the pointTotal of the participant to determine whether to value an ace as a 1 or an 11.
        Parameters:
        deck: - A Deck object representing a deck of cards
        participant: - A Participant object representing a dealer or a player
        Returns:
        card: A Card object representing a randomly chose card in a deck

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        toString method that generates a comma separated String of all the key values in the deckOfCards ArrayList
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        str: String value representing the comma separated String of all the key values in the deckOfCards ArrayList
